message:
Here is the current selection in my fridge.

http://i.imgur.com/P7QLs.jpg
The Stone 14 is a monster.. I was drinking that just last week
Usually a mix of Anchor (Steam and/or Summer Beer and/or Humming) and Sapporo.

at the moment mine is filled with a few different varieties of Weihenstephaners & Franziskaners,some James Squire Golden Ales, some Sols and I think one or two Cascade Lights that Dad left in there (he has terrible taste in beer). Oh and some Rerkorderlig strawberry & lime ciders, a little girly, but very nice on a hot day! ;p

Hit up a BevMo! the other day (seriously one of the best things about moving to CA) and have some Brother Theolonius, Gulden Draak, La Fin du Monde, and on a whim picked up a new Belgian I've not tried, Maredsous (Tripel).
